author: m.kalinin
content: then the answer is yes, you are. 0x01 and 0x02 creds types allow for exiting via 7002 request

author: for3ternity
content:
So with Spectra if we elect to stack eth then we get an 0x02 cred?
Or must create one?
I'm asking because those with compromised 0x01 cred might try to use this option as fast as possible to prevent front running if it say means you get new exit keys (0x02) and the 0x01 one doesn't work anymore

author: m.kalinin
content: You get whatever creds you specify when depositing ETH

author: for3ternity
content:
ok im already staking with 0x01 creds so those will soon be able to exit my validators
im just trying to understand if there is a change if i use the upcoming 0x02 option
will i get new keys for exiting (0x02?) and will the 0x01 key then no longer work?

author: m.kalinin
content: unfortunately, 0x01 withdrawal credentials key will still work as it remains the same key even if you switch to 0x02
